item.title: Putting slayer helmet together [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

try this

if (itemUsed == 8901 && useWith == 4551 || itemUsed == 4551 && useWith == 8901) { c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed),1); c.getItems().addItem(13263,1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need........"); }

item.title: Putting slayer helmet together [PI]
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

Ok so i made my code look like:

if (itemUsed == 8901 && useWith == 4551 || itemUsed == 4551 && useWith == 8901) { c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed),1); c.getItems().addItem(13263,1);

EDIT: I made it so it deletes all the items if you have them in your pack, but i need it so you HAVE to have all the items or else you cant make it.
